channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Atlas
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Atlas

item.title: CVE-2016-8752|2024-08-06T02:35:00.107Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20atlas
item.description: Apache Atlas versions 0.6.0 (incubating), 0.7.0 (incubating), and 0.7.1 (incubating) allow access to the webapp directory contents by pointing to URIs like /js and /img.
